## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description | Type | Default |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `align` | `align` | Accordion item dropdown alignment. | `"end" \| "start"` | `'end'` |
| `multiple` | `multiple` |  | `boolean` | `false` |
| `size` | `size` | The According size. | `"lg" \| "md" \| "sm"` | `'md'` |
